title: IPH 344 - Have you heard the raindrops

lines: soon there will be water rising
spilling from the bucket as it comes.
when the land is dry then
Jesus gives us life if we drink
sing it so that everybody knows.

chorus:
There’s water, water of life,
Jesus gives us the water of life;
 there’s water, water of life,
Jesus gives us the water of life.
CCLI: Martyn Christian Time Strover, b. 1932 CCLI 128675
